'speaker_1': 'Thank you so much. I will provide this committee report on behalf of Councilmember Mosqueda. Council Bill 120041. 'speaker_1': 'These CRF funds were part of the Federal Cares Act that was adopted on March 27, 2020, and included about $131.5 million in direct funding to the city of Seattle. 'speaker_1': 'And these funds must be expended by the city before the end of 2021.
